translation.en: [man over PA] Please welcome to the ice our Pinecrest skating pro Katarina Baker.
translation.de: Bitte begrüßen Sie auf dem Eis unseren Pinecrest-Eislaufprofi Katarina Baker.

translation.en: -[cheering and applause] -[woman] Get it, girl!
-[man 1] Kill it! -[man 2] Go for gold, Kat!
[woman] Bring it home!
[man 3] Yeah!
Serena! Up!
-[Serena sighing] How are you so awake? -♪ We're all in this together ♪
It's too early.
Come here.
-[Serena] Is it really that bad? -[Kat] Yeah. [chuckles]
-Did you look in the mirror this morning? -No! [laughs]
Am I beautiful now?
-[scoffs] Gorgeous. -[laughs]
How are my wonderful girls this morning?
translation.de: Wie geht es meinen wunderbaren Mädchen?

translation.en: -[Serena] Exhausted. -Fine.
Serena, why aren't you eating?
It's so early. If I eat, I'm gonna puke. What did Mitch say about getting enough protein?
translation.de: -Zu früh. Ich müsste kotzen. -Mitch sagte, du brauchst Proteine.

translation.en: Eat it.
And I hope you've been practicing your triple toe like you promised him.
translation.de: Hoffentlich hast du den Dreifach-Toeloop geübt.

translation.en: Because I overheard Nancy talking to the moms yesterday, and they said you're still wrapping.
translation.de: Nancy sprach gestern mit den Müttern. Du kreuzt die Beine noch.

translation.en: Show me. Show me.
Good.
Chin up.
Look, I know Nancy can be a cunt, but you've gotta stop doing that.
translation.de: Ich weiß, Nancy kann fies sein, aber hör auf damit.

translation.en: Can't hold on to bad habits.
Whatever. Her daughter sucks.
You know Emily cheats her triple toe. She's fat.
translation.de: Emily schummelt beim Dreifach-Toeloop. Sie ist fett.

translation.en: Time to go.
Remember, a flying spin, a spin combo,
and don't even think about popping your double axel or a single one of those four double jumps.
translation.de: Verhau nicht den Doppelaxel und keinen der vier Doppelsprünge.

translation.en: I read the rule book, Mom. Well, good because...
Liz isn't gonna be there tonight.
What do you mean?
Well, you don't need a coach to hold your hand for an easy test.
translation.de: Für eine leichte Prüfung braucht man keinen Trainer.

translation.en: Especially Liz. A senior test isn't easy.
Oh, come on. You'll pass it. If you didn't, it'd be--
translation.de: Ach, komm. Du bestehst schon. Sonst wäre es...

translation.en: If I'm gonna coach, I need to pass this test. And if I'm gonna pass this test, I need Liz there.
translation.de: Ich muss bestehen, um Trainerin zu werden. Und dafür brauche ich Liz.

translation.en: Well, I'm sorry, but I just can't afford to pay for both of your coaching anymore.
translation.de: Ich kann mir das Training nicht mehr für euch beide leisten.

translation.en: Were you wearing that shirt last time I saw you?
translation.de: Hattest du das Hemd neulich auch an?

translation.en: Uh, me and my boys went skiing last night.
translation.de: Meine Jungs und ich liefen Ski.

translation.en: Decided to camp up there so we could get first tracks on the pow this morning.
translation.de: Wir campten, um morgens im Pulver zu laufen.

translation.en: Pow? You mean powder.
-You right. -[laughs]
That's the whitest shit I ever said.
translation.de: So weiß rede ich sonst nie.

translation.en: You bring it out of me.
Hey, good to see you.
I'll see you later?
Yeah.
Do your thing out there.
[Serena] I'm not trying to be mean. I just...
translation.de: Ich will nicht gemein sein, aber...

translation.en: Seriously. I'm not kidding. I'm not kidding!
-It's so bad! -[laughing]
What the fuck happened to you?
Nothing.
Just Justin being a-- Did he hit on you?
-[sighs] -Jealous.
Talented, hot, and rich.
God, I wish he'd wise up and fuck me.
You know Basic Bitch is his third partner in three years?
It'll be out with the old, in with the new any day now.
translation.de: Bald holt er sich eine Neue.

translation.en: Are you telling me that you want to skate with him?
translation.de: Willst du etwa mit ihm eislaufen?

translation.en: Pair skating?
I trust no man to throw me five feet in the air going 20 miles an hour.
translation.de: Ich lasse mich von keinem Mann durch die Luft schleudern.

translation.en: That shit's a death wish.
You know she's banging him.
Really? [scoffs]
I don't know. I feel sorry for Natalie. -She has to put up with him. -Hm.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht. Natalie tut mir leid. Sie muss ihn ertragen.

translation.en: -[woman] How are we doing? -Hi!
-[sighs] -Hey...
How's it healing?
It's fine.
I caught up on a full season of Stranger Things.
-[woman] I told you guys I was right! -[laughing]
[man] All right, Serena.
No more selfies.
Once that Zamboni's off, I want you stepping on the ice.
translation.de: Wenn die Maschine weg ist, geh aufs Eis.

translation.en: -You hear me? -Yes.
How long has Serena been training with him?
translation.de: Seit wann trainiert Serena mit ihm?

translation.en: A week.
I guess he approached her at that training camp.
translation.de: Er sprach sie wohl im Trainingslager an.

translation.en: Mom fired Sharon after coaching Serena for ten years. Carol, you cold-hearted minx.
translation.de: -Mom feuerte Sharon nach zehn Jahren. -Carol, du kaltherziges Luder.

translation.en: Yup. I'm coachless, and she gets the former Olympian.
translation.de: Ich habe keinen Trainer, und sie kriegt den Ex-Olympioniken.

translation.en: Only the best for Idaho's golden child.
translation.de: Nur das Beste für Idahos Wunderkind.

translation.en: Lucky. What a bitch.
-That's my sister you're talking about. -And?
Your sister's a bitch.
Serena becomes a senior this summer,
translation.de: Im Sommer wird Serena ein Senior.

translation.en: and now I'm coming in second as she's waving on top of the podium.
translation.de: Ich stecke zurück, und sie winkt vom Podest.

translation.en: [coach] Remember, strong line. You're so lucky you don't have to compete against her.
translation.de: -Eine starke Linie. -Sei froh. Du trittst nicht gegen sie an.

translation.en: Dude, I'm so sorry.
It's fine. It's totally fine.
translation.de: Schon gut. Das ist total ok.

translation.en: All I'm focused on right now is passing my senior test.
translation.de: Ich will nur meine Senior-Prüfung bestehen.

translation.en: [coach] Right, get out.
Come on. Come on! Go!
Off you go.
[coach] Spin down. Keep spinning.
Does your sister always pop her jumps like that?
-Yeah. -Hm.
She usually chickens out at the last second.
Pity. She's a beautiful skater.
Come on. Triple toe.
Go on. Get out there.
[Kat] What the hell are you doing?
Did you not see me there?
Seriously, Kat?
You weren't even gonna try! You never do!
Excuse me?
Just saying, maybe it's time you get out of the way!
translation.de: Es ist Zeit, dass du Platz machst!

translation.en: -Serena, wh-- -[woman screams]
[man] Holy shit! It went through her foot.
translation.de: Scheiße! Er steckt in ihrem Fuß.

translation.en: -Holy shit! -I can't get it out!
Oh, my God!
[woman] Somebody call an ambulance!
-It went through her foot! -[screams]
Get her off the ice right now!
[Natalie] I can't get it out!
You'll be all right.
[woman] Come here.
[coach] Come this way. Lift.
[sighs] God! Poor Natalie.
I know. It took the EMT a full minute to get that blade out of her foot.
translation.de: Der Sanitäter brauchte eine ganze Minute, um die Kufe aus ihrem Fuß zu ziehen.

translation.en: -She'll be off the ice for months. -Uh!
I mean, that's why I come here every day.
If Emily ever had a fall like that, at least I could be with her on the way to the hospital.
translation.de: Würde Emily so stürzen, könnte ich wenigstens bei ihr sein.

translation.en: Oh, don't worry, Nance. Emily can't jump high enough to get that kind of injury.
translation.de: Keine Sorge, Nance. Emilys Sprünge sind zu niedrig dafür.

translation.en: [Nancy] When I heard what happened, I was sure
translation.de: Als ich davon hörte, war ich sicher, Justin hat wieder Mist gebaut.

translation.en: it had something to do with Justin acting up again.
translation.de: war ich sicher, Justin hat wieder Mist gebaut.

translation.en: -There's a first time for everything. -[all laughing]
translation.de: Es gibt immer ein erstes Mal.

translation.en: -Stupid women. -Ugh!
You're really coming along on your triple toe, honey.
-Thank you, Mom. -Finally.
Honestly, it's taken a lot of retraining out of some bad habits.
translation.de: Ihr die schlechten Gewohnheiten abzutrainieren, war schwer.

translation.en: I'm lucky she's so talented, and I have you to thank for that.
translation.de: Zum Glück ist sie talentiert. Dank Ihnen.

translation.en: Well, I'm just so happy that you agreed to come teach here.
translation.de: Schön, dass Sie hier Trainer wurden.

translation.en: -You're putting us back on the map. -No. Please, you're too kind.
translation.de: -Sie bringen uns groß raus. -Nein, zu freundlich.

translation.en: -All right. Well, nice chatting. -Yeah.
-Ladies. Um, let's talk soon, Carol. -Yeah.
Good double axel, honey.
Could be quicker on the landing. You should be watching Serena's axels.
translation.de: Du könntest schneller landen. Sieh dir Serenas Axel an.

translation.en: She's always very quick twitch. In, out.
-Hey, Mom. -[Jenn] Hi, Carol.
Hi, sweetheart.
Are you ready for your test? Yup.
I could whack her knee with a bat.
Or is that too '90s?
You want me to be there tonight?
Better if I'm alone for this one.
[man over PA] Katarina Baker!
[Kat] Shit.
Come on.
One, two, three, four...
Oh, come on.
[woman] You failed.
Jesus! What are you doing here?
You should not be popping such a simple jump as a double lutz.
translation.de: Du solltest einen simplen Doppellutz nicht verhauen.

translation.en: The story is your coach made you lift your arms on the triple
translation.de: Deine Trainerin sagte, du sollst die Arme beim Dreier

translation.en: at the last minute.
That's why you fail.
You don't talk much.
That's good.
And you're a beautiful skater.
I hear a rumor that you'd given it up.
[tuts] Mistake, I think.
You should skate with Justin.
You have a very strong upper body, perfect for pair skating.
translation.de: Dein Oberkörper ist stark. Perfekt für Paarlauf.

translation.en: I will help you pass some tests.
Show you how to do throws. Teach you how to jump again.
translation.de: Zeige dir Würfe und wie du wieder springst.

translation.en: -You'll be great. -I know how to jump.
I just don't.
I remember...
you land all your triple jumps consistently not so long ago.
translation.de: ...noch vor Kurzem waren deine Dreifach-Sprünge sehr gut.

translation.en: Now you're just a little scared.
translation.de: Jetzt hast du nur etwas Angst.

translation.en: I'm not a little scared.
I'm terrified.
I can fix you.
[Kat] No one starts pair skating at 21. I'm not afraid of a challenge.
translation.de: -Mit 21 fängt man keinen Paarlauf an. -Herausforderungen sind gut.

translation.en: Justin already has a partner.
Not anymore. She quit.
You give me two years, I will give you Nationals.
translation.de: Gib mir zwei Jahre. Ich bringe dich zur Landesmeisterschaft.

translation.en: And then we'll see...
how far you can go.
I'm not a pair skater.
[Kat] Sorry.
Hey, what are you doing here? I thought you were at your test.
translation.de: Hey, du hier? Hast du nicht die Prüfung?

translation.en: I failed.
I'm sorry. It's just been a while since...
translation.de: Sorry. Es ist eine Weile her, seit...

translation.en: It's okay.
-Can I-- -No.
I'm fine.
Just a...
difficult night.
I'm glad I'm here, though.
translation.de: Ich bin froh, hier zu sein.

translation.en: You've been biting again?
Are you feeling okay?
I'm fine.
That sport is crazy-making. [chuckles]
You don't have to worry about that anymore.
translation.de: Mach dir keine Sorgen mehr darüber.

translation.en: The next test is in six months, and I can't afford to wait that long.
translation.de: Auf die nächste Prüfung in sechs Monaten kann ich nicht warten.

translation.en: I have no choice.
I gotta quit.
So...
I applied to this fellowship last year in London,
translation.de: Ich habe mich für ein Stipendium in London beworben.

translation.en: and it didn't look like it was gonna pan out.
translation.de: Zuerst sah es nicht gut aus.

translation.en: But then I got the news this morning that it's happening. I'm leaving in a week.
translation.de: Aber heute Morgen bekam ich die Zusage. In einer Woche fliege ich.

translation.en: -Wh-- -And I want you to come with me. [laughs]
What?
Come on. You're quitting anyway. This is your chance to just...
translation.de: Du hörst sowieso auf. Es ist deine Chance...

translation.en: go live for a while.
Just promise me that you'll think about it.
You know, I can't believe it's all finally over.
translation.de: Ich kann nicht glauben, dass alles vorbei ist.

translation.en: I always thought I'd make my mark, you know?
translation.de: Ich wollte mir einen Namen machen.

translation.en: After all the years of training...
I thought I'd see it through to the end.
translation.de: Ich wollte es bis zum Schluss durchziehen.

translation.en: The end?
I wanted to be remembered.
Up!
What time is it?
Did you not hear me? Get up!
God, this room is filthy!
[Carol] Serena!
Mom woke me up.
She told me I have to do 30 laps around the block if I want to make Worlds.
translation.de: Ich soll 30 Runden laufen, wenn ich zur WM will.

translation.en: Shit!
Okay. I'm on my way.
Putting in my notice at the airport tomorrow,
so I can focus full time on Serena's training. And the night shift's just too much.
translation.de: Ich konzentriere mich auf Serena. Die Nachtschicht ist zu viel.

translation.en: You stopped taking your meds.
How dare you. After all I've sacrificed?
translation.de: Du wagst es? Nach allem, was ich geopfert habe.

translation.en: If I hadn't gotten pregnant with you, I would've gone to the Olympics!
translation.de: Ohne dich im Bauch wäre ich zur Olympiade gefahren!

translation.en: There's not a day I don't think about that!
I know.
-Now settle down. -Leave me alone!
Look! Look at what you're doing to her!
translation.de: Sieh doch, was du ihr antust!

translation.en: You're not healthy right now!
You're hurting her!
Do you hear me?
Yes.
I'm gonna get your lithium.
You're gonna take it while I watch.
Okay?
You okay? I think I re-sprained my wrist.
Go inside, put some ice on it,
take a shower, get into bed.
I'll call Dr. Parker in the morning.
translation.de: Morgen rufe ich Dr. Parker an.

translation.en: I'll come back and check on you, okay?
translation.de: Ich sehe gleich nach dir, ok?

translation.en: Thank you for coming.
Come on.
Sorry.
I'm sorry.
-Yeah. -[door opens]
Me too.
You look tired.
-Thanks. -[Marcus laughs]
I've got a lot on my plate.
translation.de: Ich habe viel um die Ohren.

translation.en: Well, follow my lead.
I put up with these rich-ass people
translation.de: Ich ertrage die Bonzen, um für Skipässe zu sparen

translation.en: just so I can save up for my lift passes and ski with my boys.
translation.de: Ich ertrage die Bonzen, um für Skipässe zu sparen und Ski zu laufen.

translation.en: I keep life simple.
Whatever you're doing seems complicated.
Well, it's about to get a lot less complicated.
I quit skating.
And I'm thinking about moving to London with Dave.
translation.de: Ich überlege, mit Dave nach London zu ziehen.

translation.en: No!
I mean,
I don't think you should.
Why?
[man 1] Watch your back.
[man 2] Sit down, everybody!
-Hey, kid. -Good to see you too, sir.
Looks like the owners are here.
They're in your section.
I should get out there.
Kat Baker! I heard you were working today. How you doin', sweetheart?
translation.de: Kat! Ich hörte, dass du heute hier bist. Wie geht's?

translation.en: I'm good, thanks. What can I get you guys?
translation.de: Gut. Was kann ich euch bringen?

translation.en: -I'll have a beer. -Shut up, Reid.
[Reid] Strawberry daiquiri with a lot of rum, please.
Dasha tells me that you may be my son's new partner.
translation.de: Dasha sagt, du wirst vielleicht die Partnerin meines Sohnes.

translation.en: -Dad. -Did she?
Well, I'm actually quitting.
Listen, I understand money's a little tight right now,
translation.de: Ich weiß, das Geld ist knapp.

translation.en: so I'd like to help you out with that.
Just think, instead of taking drink orders from my guests,
I'd be paying you to do something you love.
translation.de: bezahle ich dich für das, was du liebst.

translation.en: Either way, the money's coming from the same place.
translation.de: Das Geld kommt von derselben Quelle.

translation.en: She's heard you, honey. Let's give her some time to think, maybe.
translation.de: Sie hat dich gehört. Gib ihr Zeit zum Nachdenken.

translation.en: [man] Okay. Okay.
Listen, I'm not trying to strong-arm you.
It's just, you know, when my late wife first got Justin into figure skating,
translation.de: Als meine verstorbene Frau einen Eisläufer aus Justin machte,

translation.en: I was a little worried he might turn into some kind of a fruitcake.
translation.de: fürchtete ich, aus ihm wird ein Spinner.

translation.en: But, you know, she saw something in him, and it turns out she was right.
translation.de: Aber sie sah etwas in ihm, und sie hatte recht.

translation.en: My boy has Olympic-size talent.
He just needs a partner now who can match that.
translation.de: Er braucht nur die passende Partnerin.

translation.en: Think it over.
Beautiful.
-I'm suddenly in the mood for champagne. -Ooh!
Bring us a bottle of my good stuff.
Of course. Right away.
I think we may have gotten through to her.
translation.de: Ich glaube, wir haben sie überzeugt.

translation.en: [woman] Kat!
You got a second, honey?
Sure.
Right. I remember.
Look, I just wanted to apologize for my husband.
translation.de: Ich will mich nur für meinen Mann entschuldigen.

translation.en: He really is a good person.
You don't have to. It's fine.
No, it wasn't fine.
He put you on the spot, and I saw your face, and you looked like you were about to kill him.
translation.de: Er brachte dich in Verlegenheit. Du hättest ihn am liebsten umgebracht.

translation.en: If I didn't love that man so much, I'd wanna kill him too.
translation.de: Würde ich ihn nicht so lieben, ginge es mir auch so.

translation.en: Okay, so I know Justin is a goddamn pain in the ass,
translation.de: Ok, ich weiß, Justin ist eine Nervensäge,

translation.en: and I wish him on no woman, but I also know he is the real deal.
translation.de: und keine Frau sollte ihn ertragen müssen, aber er hat was drauf.

translation.en: And that boy has a gift.
So I keep hearing.
Don't worry. I'm not trying to sell you on him again.
translation.de: Keine Sorge. Ich will ihn dir nicht aufschwatzen.

translation.en: And it's not my place to tell you what to do...
translation.de: Es steht mir nicht zu, dir Vorschriften zu machen...

translation.en: but if you do choose to partner with Justin,
just know that you've got an ally in me.
translation.de: hast du in mir eine Verbündete.

translation.en: Thanks.
All right. I'd better get back in there before James starts to wonder
translation.de: Ok. Ich gehe lieber zurück, bevor James sich fragt,

translation.en: what's taking me so long in the bathroom. [chuckles]
translation.de: was ich so lange im WC mache.

translation.en: [Serena] Thanks!
Where's Mom?
She's in bed.
I had her take a sedative and call into work sick.
translation.de: Sie nahm ihr Beruhigungsmittel und meldete sich krank.

translation.en: Why are you suddenly wearing eyeliner?
Who drove you home?
I thought he was gonna tell me to stay home because of my wrist,
translation.de: Ich dachte, ich bleibe zu Hause,

translation.en: but he had me doing off-ice training literally all day long.
translation.de: aber ich habe den ganzen Tag Trockentraining gemacht.

translation.en: He drove you home?
Serena, I don't like the way he acts around you.
translation.de: Ich mag nicht, wie er mit dir umgeht.

translation.en: What are you talking about?
I saw him slap your ass with his gloves the other day.
translation.de: Ich sah, wie er dir auf den Hintern gehauen hat.

translation.en: Oh, my God. It was a joke.
Serena, you really have to be careful about who you trust.
translation.de: Du musst aufpassen, wem du vertraust.

translation.en: Have you ever thought that after
everything that has happened with you and Mom, Mitch is the only person in my life I can trust?
translation.de: dass nach allem mit dir und Mom Mitch der Einzige ist, dem ich vertraue?

translation.en: Are you serious right now?
I'm just trying to look out for you.
translation.de: Ich will nur auf dich aufpassen.

translation.en: Honestly?
I think you're doing this because you're jealous.
Your Olympic dreams are over, and mine are just beginning.
translation.de: Dein Traum von Olympia ist vorbei, meiner fängt gerade an.

translation.en: The best that you could've hoped for was coaching.
translation.de: Du konntest nur noch hoffen, Trainerin zu werden.

translation.en: But now that you've failed your test, you can't even do that.
So, of course,
you're trying to screw up my training by attacking Mitch.
translation.de: dass du Mitch angreifst, um mein Training zu sabotieren.

translation.en: Why do you always have to be such a little bitch, Serena?
translation.de: Warum bist du immer so ein Miststück?

translation.en: Everyone thinks you're this saint.
translation.de: Alle halten dich für eine Heilige.

translation.en: But it's obvious now. You are just as messed up and bipolar as she is.
translation.de: Aber jetzt ist es klar. Du bist genauso gestört und bipolar wie sie.

translation.en: That's so unfair.
I've been able to manage it.
She hasn't.
[Serena] Whatever.
The rink doesn't open till 5:00 a.m.
translation.de: Die Halle macht erst um fünf Uhr auf.

translation.en: It's 5:00 a.m. somewhere, George.
Are you trying to kill an old lady?
translation.de: Willst du eine alte Dame umbringen?

translation.en: What you just did,
that was remarkable.
Here... My contact information.
For when you change your mind.
Thanks, but I'm done.
That was my last skate. You should talk to my sister.
translation.de: Das war mein letzter Lauf. Reden Sie mit meiner Schwester.

translation.en: Serena's better than I am. She's the one you want.
translation.de: Serena ist besser als ich. Nehmen Sie sie.

translation.en: Yeah.
Yeah, she's more consistent.
More powerful.
But you have "it"...
in a way your sister never will.
translation.de: Deine Schwester wird das nie haben.

translation.en: You have magic there, girl.
You deserve to be remembered.
translation.de: Du verdienst es, in Erinnerung zu bleiben.

translation.en: Thanks.
I gotta go to work.
[Jenn] I'm ready for good news.
Your only option is to get off that leg and rehab it for at least three months.
translation.de: Sie müssen das Bein entlasten und mindestens drei Monate zur Reha.

translation.en: Regionals is in three months. Not gonna happen.
translation.de: Dann ist die Regionalmeisterschaft. Auf keinen Fall.

translation.en: If you don't rest your hip now,
you're not just gonna have trouble skating. You could have trouble walking.
translation.de: wird das Eislaufen ein Problem und auch das Laufen.

translation.en: Okay, I'm out. See you later.
I heard you failed. Yeah.
That sucks.
I also heard...
we're going out tonight.
I know I could use a drink.
-[laughs] -Come on!
[Jenn] Let's go. Let's go.
Come on! Come on!
We're gonna have so much fun!
You look great. -We're gonna have a lot of fun, okay? -Welcome.
translation.de: -Du siehst toll aus. Wir amüsieren uns. -Willkommen.

translation.en: Let's get you some drinks.
[Jenn] That would be great, thank you.
Oh! You're a pro, apparently.
[Kat] Bottle service?
Who's paying for all this?
Not you.
I think I'll need one more.
It'll help numb the pain of knowing you're moving to London.
translation.de: Es betäubt den Schmerz über deinen Umzug nach London.

translation.en: Oh, I have something for you.
I found it when I was cleaning the house the other day.
translation.de: Ich fand es neulich beim Putzen.

translation.en: [Kat chuckles] Wow! I can't believe you still have this.
translation.de: Wow, unglaublich, dass du das noch hast.

translation.en: Look how happy we look.
Your dress is ugly. Yeah, it was.
Remember what we promised each other that summer? [laughs]
translation.de: Erinnerst du dich an unser Versprechen?

translation.en: -Uh... -[together] Olympics or die!
Seems like a reasonable motto when you're nine.
But things change.
-Kat-- -Look, I know what you're trying to do.
I'm not gonna stay, okay? I can't even pass my senior test.
translation.de: Ich bleibe nicht. Ich schaffe nicht mal die Senior-Prüfung.

translation.en: I really don't think you should give it all up.
Don't throw away an opportunity.
What opportunity are you talking about exactly?
To be Justin's partner.
How the hell do you even know about that?
Come on! I know everything that happens at that stupid rink.
translation.de: Komm schon. Ich weiß alles, was in der Eishalle passiert.

translation.en: I don't understand why everyone suddenly thinks this is a good idea.
translation.de: Ich verstehe nicht, warum alle das für eine gute Idee halten.

translation.en: Do it for that little girl.
translation.de: Tu es für das kleine Mädchen.

translation.en: Wrong girl.
I'll be right back.
[Justin] Hello.
Guys, give me a second.
[Justin] Thanks for talking to her for me.
translation.de: Danke, dass du mit ihr redest.

translation.en: Not sure it's gonna work, but I did my best.
translation.de: Ausgang ungewiss, aber ich gab mein Bestes.

translation.en: Thanks for the table.
I like sharing the wealth.
Cheers.
You have a good night.
-Oops. -[Mitch] Hey. Kat Baker, are you drunk?
Hey. What's up?
She just had a little too much to drink.
If you ever hurt my sister,
if you touch her,
I will kill you.
Lacey's cool. It's such bullshit.
translation.de: Lacey ist cool. So ein Blödsinn.

translation.en: You guys wanna go to Jimmy's after this?
translation.de: Wollt ihr nachher zu Jimmy gehen?

translation.en: -Kat! -Not now!
Maybe stop pretending like you hate me.
-Stop messing with me! -Whoa there.
I don't know what game you're playing, but just stop.
translation.de: Was spielst du für ein Spiel? Hör auf damit.

translation.en: I'm not. I just think we'd work well together.
translation.de: Gar keins. Wir würden gut harmonieren.

translation.en: Why?
'Cause, unlike what everybody thinks, I actually do care about skating.
translation.de: Anders als alle denken, ist mir Eislaufen wichtig.

translation.en: And I want to win.
So you had your dad try and buy me?
translation.de: Also sollte dein Dad mich kaufen?

translation.en: Do you know how humiliating that was for me?
translation.de: Weißt du, wie demütigend das war?

translation.en: -It's just how he does things. -[sighs] Great.
And don't tell me you couldn't use the help.
I will never take a handout from you.
translation.de: Ich nehme keine Almosen von dir an.

translation.en: Ever.
[Kat] Hey.
Help yourselves. It's on my dad.
That way.
Should you really be out on a school night? What do you mean?
translation.de: -Solltest du unter der Woche ausgehen? -Was meinst du?

translation.en: Well, I heard you're a skater.
Isn't this thing kinda frowned upon?
They can't frown upon anything they don't know about.
Cheers.
Just got off the phone with Mitch.
He was telling me that you were drunk and acting inappropriate at some bar.
translation.de: Er sagte, du hast dich betrunken und danebenbenommen.

translation.en: I don't trust him around Serena.
translation.de: Ich traue ihm bei Serena nicht.

translation.en: What?
It's the way he...
translation.de: Die Art, wie er sie anfasst.

translation.en: he touches her, you know?
translation.de: Die Art, wie er sie anfasst. Weißt du? Mein Instinkt sagt, da stimmt was nicht.

translation.en: It's an instinct. Something's not right, Mom.
translation.de: Weißt du? Mein Instinkt sagt, da stimmt was nicht.

translation.en: An instinct, honey?
Look, I am so sorry that I've put you through all of this lately.
translation.de: Es tut mir sehr leid, dass ich dir so viel zugemutet habe.

translation.en: I know my episodes can trigger yours.
translation.de: Ich weiß, meine Episoden können deine triggern.

translation.en: If you haven't been taking your meds--
Mom, come on.
You know what I'm talking about.
This happened to you.
God, I wish I hadn't told you that.
translation.de: Hätte ich das bloß nie erzählt.

translation.en: That was complicated, okay?
Look, sometimes you and me,
we just-- we can't trust ourselves, honey.
translation.de: können uns manchmal selbst nicht trauen.

translation.en: Every day, I wish you didn't get my brain, but you did.
translation.de: Leider habe ich dir mein Gehirn vererbt.

translation.en: And so you have to be very careful when you get these "instincts."
translation.de: Du musst mit diesen Instinkten sehr vorsichtig sein.

translation.en: I'm not having an episode.
Well, it's looking a lot like it did last time.
translation.de: Es sieht sehr aus wie letztes Mal.

translation.en: You don't get to do this.
I'm done with this!
Where are you going?
I'm gonna go live in London with Dave.
translation.de: Ich gehe mit Dave nach London.

translation.en: I thought you were gonna pass your senior test?
You were there. You saw what happened.
translation.de: Du hast gesehen, was passiert ist.

translation.en: Well, you can take it again in six months.
Why do you suddenly care about me becoming a coach so much?
translation.de: Warum willst du plötzlich, dass ich Trainerin werde?

translation.en: Do you seriously think I wanted you to become a coach?
translation.de: Denkst du wirklich, ich will das?

translation.en: I wanted you to pass
so that you could put everything that happened to you behind you.
translation.de: damit du endlich vergisst, was geschah.

translation.en: Never gonna happen.
Get back on the competition track where you belong.
translation.de: Lauf in Wettkämpfen. Da gehörst du hin.

translation.en: You and me, Kat, we're the same...
always tripping at the finish line.
God, I wish we had Serena's toughness. I really do.
There is no "we."
I'm not gonna lose three jobs in three years
translation.de: Ich verliere nicht drei Jobs in drei Jahren,

translation.en: 'cause I keep forgetting to take my meds.
I'm not gonna sleep with losers who throw me away after one night!
translation.de: Ich schlafe nicht mit Versagern, die mich nach einer Nacht abservieren!

translation.en: I'm not gonna train my children so hard,
translation.de: Ich trainiere meine Kinder nicht so hart,

translation.en: my youngest ends up in the emergency room!
translation.de: dass die Jüngste in der Notaufnahme landet!

translation.en: There is no "we!"
Yeah, if I'm so horrible,
then why did I drive you to 5:00 a.m. practice every day for fucking ten years?
translation.de: warum fuhr ich dich zehn Jahre lang um fünf Uhr zum Training?

translation.en: Why did I fight to get you all the best coaches...
translation.de: Warum kämpfte ich für die besten Trainer

translation.en: and work overtime every chance I could get so that you could have ice time
translation.de: und machte Überstunden, damit du aufs Eis gehen konntest

translation.en: and pay for your medical bills after your fall?
translation.de: und ich die Ärzte bezahlen konnte?

translation.en: Don't try and make this about me!
translation.de: Tu nicht so, als ginge es um mich!

translation.en: This has always been about you!
translation.de: Es ging immer nur um dich!

translation.en: You just can't stand to let Serena have a turn in the spotlight, can you?
translation.de: Du erträgst es nicht, dass Serena im Rampenlicht steht, oder?

translation.en: Maybe you should go.
Go.
What are you doing?
Everything I worked for with Kat is garbage, so I threw it away.
translation.de: Alles, wofür ich mit Kat arbeitete, ist Müll und kann weg.

translation.en: She's gone.
It's okay.
[James] There she is. Leah!
Nice to meet you.
This is my son. This is the guy I told you about.
translation.de: Mein Sohn, von dem ich dir erzählt habe.

translation.en: Leah just moved here from Seattle,
and she's in the market for a new partner.
And, lucky for us,
her and her family just happen to be staying with us here at the lodge.
translation.de: wohnt sie mit ihrer Familie hier bei uns in der Lodge.

translation.en: Lucky.
♪ By the time you call my name ♪ ♪ I'm long gone ♪
translation.de: SIE SIND JETZT IN SUN VALLEY GEGRÜNDET 1936

translation.en: ♪ Ain't finished till the finish line comes ♪
